description: Enterprise techniques used by NETWIRE, ATT&CK software S0198 v1.1
name: NETWIRE (S0198)

techniques.comment: NETWIRE creates a Registry start-up entry to establish persistence.[2]
NETWIRE can capture the victim's screen.[2]
The NETWIRE client has been signed by fake and invalid digital certificates.[2]
NETWIRE can discover and collect victim system information.[2]
